NOTICE_DATA.ORIGINAL_CPV: Repair and maintenance services of measuring, testing and checking apparatus

CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Union, with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01C02

TITLE.P: Servicing, Preventative Maintenance, Breakdown Cover, Spare Parts and Warranty Extensions of Chromatography Equipment

SHORT_DESCR.P: You are invited to submit a tender for the following requirements; servicing, preventative maintenance, breakdown cover, spare parts and warranty extensions of chromatography equipment. For more information please download the tender documents at https://ne1procurementservices.com

MAIN_SITE.P: Main place of performance is CPI's Darlington site.

SHORT_DESCR.P: You are invited to submit a tender for the following requirements; servicing, preventative maintenance, breakdown cover, spare parts and warranty extensions of chromatography equipment. For more information please download the tender documents at https://ne1procurementservices.com

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: Framework duration is 36 months with an additional 12-month extension.

EU_PROGR_RELATED.P: Upon successful award, the requirements of this Tender can be procured by any department, branch, division, business unit, site, subsidiary or any other legal entity of CPI, against any existing or future project and/or order, whether or not it is part funded by the European Regional Development Fund (ERDF) Competitive Programme 2014 – 2020, or any subsequent replacement Competitive Programme

SUITABILITY.P: Please refer to the suite of tender documents for further information. Available at https://ne1procurementservices.com/

PERFORMANCE_CONDITIONS.P: Please refer to the suite of tender documents for further information. Available at https://ne1procurementservices.com/
